About Me

My name is Adaline and I am a current sophomore at Vanderbilt University majoring in computer science and minoring in data science and business.

Currently, I am a research assistant in the Vanderbilt Institute for Software Integrated Systems for the Improving Community and Neighborhood Safety Through Open Data Collection project lead by Professor Daniel Balasubramanian.
